title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
overview: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime with the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in a tale of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more through the eyes of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing is given a chance to have his criminal history erased.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
overview: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Lion King
overview: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, but returns as an adult to reclaim it.

title: Titanic
overview: A young aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer.

title: The Green Mile
overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder.

title: The Departed
overview: An undercover cop and a mole in the police try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

title: Whiplash
overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams are mentored by an abusive instructor.

title: The Prestige
overview: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship with tragic results.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a mischievous demigod.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: The Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions.

title: Parasite
overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten a newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy and poor.

title: Joker
overview: In Gotham City, a mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to chaos.
Two British soldiers are given a mission to deliver a message deep in enemy territory.

title: Django Unchained
overview: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: Shutter Island
overview: A U.S Marshal investigates a psychiatric facility after a patient goes missing.

title: The Social Network
overview: The story of the founding of Facebook.

title: The Imitation Game
overview: During WWII, a mathematician tries to crack the Enigma code.

title: La La Land
overview: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrant.

title: Black Panther
overview: T'Challa returns home as king of Wakanda but finds his sovereignty challenged.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort.

title: Inglourious Basterds
overview: A plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers.

title: The Revenant
overview: A frontiersman fights for survival after being mauled by a bear.

title: The Big Short
overview: The financial crisis of 2007–2008 is predicted by a few people.

title: Her
overview: A lonely man develops a relationship with an AI operating system.

title: Ex Machina
overview: A young programmer is selected to test a female AI.

title: Get Out
overview: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's family.

title: Us
overview: A family is confronted by their doppelgängers.

title: No Country for Old Men
overview: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter finds money.

title: A Beautiful Mind
overview: A brilliant mathematician struggles with schizophrenia.

title: The Theory of Everything
overview: The life of Stephen Hawking.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
overview: The story of Freddie Mercury and Queen.

title: Soul
overview: A musician has a near-death experience and explores the afterlife.

title: Coco
overview: A boy is transported to the Land of the Dead.

title: Inside Out
overview: A young girl's emotions try to guide her through life.

title: Up
overview: An old man ties thousands of balloons to his house.

title: Finding Nemo
overview: After his son is captured, a clownfish sets out to find him.

title: WALL·E
overview: A robot is left to clean a waste-covered Earth.

title: Ratatouille
overview: A rat with culinary dreams teams up with a chef.
